summary: remade dragonling race from scratch with new meshes
descriptionHtml:
Requires Animated Dragon Wings and Dragonborn DLC
_____________________________________________________________________________________________

remade dragonling race from scratch with new meshes and compatibility with animated dragon wings

also added 3 new powers

Breath of Fire
Breath of Lightning
Breath of Frost

they all require stamina to use and the more stamina you have the stronger they become
author: Elfendrago
